en: A reliable blade with high accuracy but low Attack. Range 1
A reliable bow with okay accuracy and okay Attack. Range 2
A weaker tome of magic. Range 1-2
Sharp deteriorating claws that cut. Range 1
Dangerous teeth used for biting. Range 1
A more difficult to use bow, with decent accuracy and okay Attack. Range 2
A more difficult to use sword, with lower accuracy but good Attack. Range 1
A more advanced magic blast with lower accuracy but good SpAttack. Range 1-2
A crackshot with higher skill, but low defense and lower Attack
A user of black magics, with okay SpAttack but a higher Defense for scrapping
A user of nature magic with high SpAttack but low Defense and SpDefense
Studier of holy arts, Light Mages can heal allies but have low agressive and defensive stats
A scrapper on the battlefield with high Health and okay Attack. Good for tanking.
A shambling corpse with low stats
Couldn't be older than a month or two
A young wolf not yet in its prime
